var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "div",
    [
      _c("TopHeader"),
      _c("b-container", { staticClass: "mt-5" }, [
        _c("section", { staticClass: "container py-20" }, [
          _c(
            "div",
            {
              staticClass:
                "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 bg-primary rounded-xl shadow-3xl overflow-hidden",
            },
            [
              _c(
                "div",
                {
                  staticClass:
                    "flex flex-col items-center justify-between gap-8 p-5 md:p-10 lg:p-14",
                },
                [
                  _c(
                    "div",
                    [
                      _c(
                        "b-row",
                        { attrs: { "align-h": "center" } },
                        [
                          _c(
                            "b-col",
                            { attrs: { cols: "10", md: "7", lg: "5" } },
                            [
                              _c(
                                "b-card",
                                { staticStyle: { color: "#001e5f" } },
                                [
                                  _c(
                                    "h4",
                                    { staticClass: "font-weight-bold" },
                                    [_vm._v("Connexion")]
                                  ),
                                  _c(
                                    "b-form",
                                    {
                                      staticClass: "mt-4",
                                      on: {
                                        submit: function ($event) {
                                          $event.stopPropagation()
                                          $event.preventDefault()
                                          return _vm.login.apply(
                                            null,
                                            arguments
                                          )
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    [
                                      _c(
                                        "b-form-group",
                                        {
                                          attrs: {
                                            id: "input-group-email",
                                            label: "Email",
                                            "label-for": "input-email",
                                          },
                                        },
                                        [
                                          _c(
                                            "label",
                                            {
                                              staticClass:
                                                "px-3 py-1 text-lg join-item text-pastelBlue border-r border-r-slate-400",
                                            },
                                            [
                                              _c("i", {
                                                staticClass:
                                                  "fa-solid fa-envelope",
                                              }),
                                            ]
                                          ),
                                          _c("b-form-input", {
                                            ref: "emailField",
                                            staticClass:
                                              "px-3 py-2 w-full text-sm join-item outline-none bg-transparent",
                                            attrs: {
                                              id: "input-email",
                                              type: "email",
                                              state: _vm.emailValidation,
                                              required: "",
                                            },
                                            model: {
                                              value: _vm.email,
                                              callback: function ($$v) {
                                                _vm.email = $$v
                                              },
                                              expression: "email",
                                            },
                                          }),
                                          _c(
                                            "b-form-invalid-feedback",
                                            {
                                              attrs: {
                                                state: _vm.emailValidation,
                                              },
                                            },
                                            [
                                              _vm._v(
                                                " " +
                                                  _vm._s(
                                                    _vm.invalidEmailMessage
                                                  ) +
                                                  " "
                                              ),
                                            ]
                                          ),
                                        ],
                                        1
                                      ),
                                      _c(
                                        "b-form-group",
                                        {
                                          attrs: {
                                            id: "input-group-password",
                                            label: "Mot de passe",
                                            "label-for": "input-password",
                                          },
                                        },
                                        [
                                          _c(
                                            "label",
                                            {
                                              staticClass:
                                                "px-3 py-1 text-lg join-item text-pastelBlue border-r border-r-slate-400",
                                            },
                                            [
                                              _c("i", {
                                                staticClass: "fa-solid fa-lock",
                                              }),
                                            ]
                                          ),
                                          _c("b-form-input", {
                                            staticClass:
                                              "px-3 py-2 w-full text-sm join-item outline-none bg-transparent",
                                            attrs: {
                                              id: "input-password",
                                              type: "password",
                                              required: "",
                                            },
                                            model: {
                                              value: _vm.password,
                                              callback: function ($$v) {
                                                _vm.password = $$v
                                              },
                                              expression: "password",
                                            },
                                          }),
                                        ],
                                        1
                                      ),
                                      _c(
                                        "b-alert",
                                        {
                                          staticClass: "my-2 p-1 pl-2",
                                          attrs: {
                                            variant: "primary",
                                            show: _vm.loginAlert,
                                          },
                                        },
                                        [
                                          _vm._v(
                                            " " + _vm._s(_vm.loginMessage) + " "
                                          ),
                                        ]
                                      ),
                                      _c(
                                        "b-row",
                                        [
                                          _c("b-col", { attrs: { cols: "3" } }),
                                          _c(
                                            "b-col",
                                            { attrs: { cols: "6" } },
                                            [
                                              _c(
                                                "b-button",
                                                {
                                                  staticClass: "p-2 mt-2",
                                                  attrs: {
                                                    block: "",
                                                    type: "submit",
                                                    variant: "warning",
                                                  },
                                                },
                                                [_vm._v(" Connexion ")]
                                              ),
                                            ],
                                            1
                                          ),
                                          _c("b-col", { attrs: { cols: "3" } }),
                                        ],
                                        1
                                      ),
                                    ],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                  _c(
                                    "b-row",
                                    { staticClass: "mt-2" },
                                    [
                                      _c(
                                        "b-col",
                                        { staticClass: "text-center" },
                                        [
                                          _c(
                                            "small",
                                            [
                                              _c(
                                                "b-link",
                                                {
                                                  directives: [
                                                    {
                                                      name: "b-toggle",
                                                      rawName:
                                                        "v-b-toggle.request-password-token",
                                                      modifiers: {
                                                        "request-password-token": true,
                                                      },
                                                    },
                                                  ],
                                                },
                                                [
                                                  _vm._v(
                                                    " Mot de passe oublié? "
                                                  ),
                                                ]
                                              ),
                                            ],
                                            1
                                          ),
                                        ]
                                      ),
                                    ],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                  _c(
                                    "b-collapse",
                                    { attrs: { id: "request-password-token" } },
                                    [_c("ReqPassToken")],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                  _c("hr"),
                                  _c(
                                    "b-row",
                                    [
                                      _c(
                                        "b-col",
                                        { staticClass: "text-center" },
                                        [
                                          _vm._v(" Nouveau client?  "),
                                          _c(
                                            "b-link",
                                            { attrs: { to: "/register" } },
                                            [_vm._v("Créez votre compte")]
                                          ),
                                        ],
                                        1
                                      ),
                                    ],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                ],
                                1
                              ),
                            ],
                            1
                          ),
                        ],
                        1
                      ),
                    ],
                    1
                  ),
                ]
              ),
            ]
          ),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("MyFooter", { staticClass: "mt-5" }),
    ],
    1
  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
